In New York City, a tragic cold snap has resulted in 13 homeless deaths despite outreach efforts, while transportation disruptions continue with NJ to NYC train delays and a blocked tunnel; additionally, a cable incident in Brooklyn and fatal fires in the boroughs highlight ongoing safety concerns.

### Risks & Alerts

- Code Blue alert issued as 13 people found dead outside in NYC amid cold weather. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- NJ to NYC trains delayed by 45 minutes due to a blocked tunnel. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMipgFBVV95cUxQWXg1SmRkSncwaWc4TWNLWmwyWjBzQ2ZuTTZ6cnJDdXBncWE0QmZzNXNTUWdQNFA1NHdRaWZVLWxHeXViZk94R19rajIwc25lUGE5UnFKOF9OTGJ6OGRva1FhVW1jb2tMeGVEbE8tRE1TLU1HMno2d2Jwa2FXcEZHVE1UbENsZk9LSmNvalFjNVgyUHRKNFpUeXZEY0pGZVR6RVVyOHJ3?oc=5)
- Cable fell from train track onto cars in Brooklyn, no injuries reported. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMimwFBVV95cUxPWnE5ZXlPelF2czFHY3lDSzBSbG1DcFA3TUFXMEEzdzhOTGlCLTVmaW02aUlrRkZKZWNCYWxrZU9Zd19yaC1vMG5aYjRJVVdicmZHeW1nM2pmNHctOW1PeXo0XzRpQV9QNzJkZk5XajhzMXB3NEE5Yk9jU0VfY0Y4cW9wRlFKMGRHaWZ1by1wMlBUSEdjVGdKS24xOA?oc=5)
- Pipeline warning sign posted on Staten Island's South Shore; residents advised to stay informed. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Pulaski Bridge was stuck in an upright position for 2 hours before reopening. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMilgFBVV95cUxOS05rUEtsVEd3ZE5aOEUzbGFLX1BYdjlyajYtTnRzbmtlU3NqbDRvcXhUaVdnT3dUVXdEc1lROVh0ZXRWaFJYc2VGLVdQSXdHN3NjdzkwVWpLaTJhbmNzOVpQeWpJN2xqOVJIQUNfS3BLSUxVeTFuY3F6UWdLMU5EcEpyeEhZSlVrcVRNZWM5UkVHV3lyZFE?oc=5)
